title: Orientifold 4-plane in brane configurations and N=4 USp(2Nc) and SO(Nc) theory
abstract: We consider brane configurations in elliptic models which represent softly broken N=4 USp(2 N_c) and SO(N_c) theory. We generalize the notion of the O4 plane, so that it is compatible with the symmetry in the covering space of the elliptic models. By using this notion of the O4 plane, we find the curve for softly broken N=4 USp(2 N_c) and that for SO(N_c) theory as infinite series expansions. For the USp case, we can present the expansion as a polynomial.
